main event: A UFO sighting was reported on March 6, 1967, by a witness located east of Dayton, Ohio.
interesting points: The object appeared to be about the size of the full moon at various times,The object exhibited constant, zig-zag, erratic flight characteristics,The object was bright and flickering,The witness estimated the distance of the object to be about 1 1/2 miles away,The object seemed to disappear completely and then reappear in another location.
sighted object: an unidentified flying object emitting light
witness description: The witness was a 30-year-old male from Dayton, Ohio.
